name.baseName: Copper production ; pyrometallurgical processes; Total of all wind farm
铜生产 ;火法炼铜; 整个风电场

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The data set represents materials and processes utilized in the production phase of wind power generation. It includes the manufacturing of 1.5 MW wind turbines, substations, and cables for wind farms. This infrastructure is specifically used in the generation of renewable energy within wind farms, and in this dataset, it focuses on a case study from a wind farm located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, which has the highest concentration of wind power installations in China.
该数据集代表风力发电生产阶段中使用的材料和工艺。它包括1.5兆瓦风力涡轮机、变电站和风电场电缆的制造。这些基础设施专门用于风电场的可再生能源发电，在这个数据集中，它侧重于位于中国装机容量最大的风电省份—内蒙古东北部的风电场案例研究。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1.5 MW wind turbine

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The data regarding the parameters of wind power has been collected from Wang (2012). A wind farm equipped with 33 domestic 1.5 megawatts (MW) wind turbines is regarded as a case study to analyze the environmental impact and its substitution effects. The wind farm is located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, the province in which most of China’s wind power is installed (Xia and Song, 2017).
风电功率参数的数据来自Wang ( 2012 )。以装有33台国产1.5兆瓦( MW )风电机组的风电场为案例，分析其环境影响及其替代效应。该风电场位于我国风电装机最多的省份- -内蒙古东北部。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents materials and processes utilized in the production phase of wind power generation. It includes the manufacturing of 1.5 MW wind turbines, substations, and cables for wind farms. This infrastructure is specifically used in the generation of renewable energy within wind farms, and in this dataset, it focuses on a case study from a wind farm located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, which has the highest concentration of wind power installations in China.
该数据集代表风力发电生产阶段中使用的材料和工艺。它包括1.5兆瓦风力涡轮机、变电站和风电场电缆的制造。这些基础设施专门用于风电场的可再生能源发电，在这个数据集中，它侧重于位于中国装机容量最大的风电省份—内蒙古东北部的风电场案例研究。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The life cycle inventory for wind power is illustrated as follows. The production and manufacturing stage include the production of wind turbines, substations, and cables, which consume a large amount of energy and emit pollutants (Xue et al., 2015).
风电的生命周期清单如下所示。生产制造阶段包括风电机组、变电站、电缆的生产，这些设备消耗大量能源，排放污染物( Xue et al . , 2015)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data regarding the parameters of wind power has been collected from Wang (2012). A wind farm equipped with 33 domestic 1.5 megawatts (MW) wind turbines is regarded as a case study to analyze the environmental impact and its substitution effects. The wind farm is located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, the province in which most of China’s wind power is installed (Xia and Song, 2017).
风电功率参数的数据来自Wang ( 2012 )。以装有33台国产1.5兆瓦( MW )风电机组的风电场为案例，分析其环境影响及其替代效应。该风电场位于我国风电装机最多的省份- -内蒙古东北部。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, H., Jiang, H.-D., Dong, K.-Y., Wei, Y.-M. & Liao, H. A comparative analysis of the life cycle environmental emissions from wind and coal power: Evidence from China. Journal of Cleaner Production 248, 119192 (2020).

Li, H., Jiang, H.-D., Dong, K.-Y., Wei, Y.-M. & Liao, H. A comparative analysis of the life cycle environmental emissions from wind and coal power: Evidence from China. Journal of Cleaner Production 248, 119192 (2020).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This data set should be used to understand the environmental impacts of the production and manufacturing stages of a 1.5 MW wind turbine infrastructure. Users should note that the data reflects the specific context of wind power generation in Inner Mongolia, and may not be representative of other regions or countries. The implications for energy consumption and pollutant emissions should be contextualized within the regional energy infrastructure and the role of wind power in substituting traditional energy sources. Additionally, when using the data for life cycle assessment or environmental impact analysis, it may be necessary to account for regional variations in energy mix, production practices, and environmental regulations.
此数据集应用于理解1.5兆瓦风力涡轮机基础设施生产和制造阶段的环境影响。用户应注意，数据反映了内蒙古风力发电的具体情况，可能不代表其他地区或国家。能源消耗和污染物排放的影响应该在区域能源基础设施的背景下进行考虑，以及风力发电替代传统能源中的作用。此外，在使用数据进行生命周期评估或环境影响分析时，可能需要考虑能源组合、生产实践和环境法规在区域间的差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Energy, gross calorific value, in biomass, primary forest
